name: PlumbIt
description:
There's something up with the drains, and it's not just the smell. An unspeakable evil is coursing through the pipes, spewing monsters all over town. It's lucky for us that everyone's favourite platforming plumber is on call to deal with the problem! Help Plumb-man fix the pipes and vanquish the monsters.

Controls

Move left/right: O, P; arrow keys; D-pad
Climb up/down: Q, A; arrow keys; D-pad 
Jump: SPACE; DualShock Cross, Xbox A, Nintendo B
Item: [throw or swap] SHIFT; DualShock Circle, Xbox B, Nintendo B 
Pause: H
Toggle full-screen: F
Music on/off: M [starts off on web]
Sound on/off: S

Credits
  • Code by SJC 
  • Graphics by Kenney
    • Plumb-man and monsters via the Creature Mixer
    • Tiles from the Pixel Platformer asset set
    • Backgrounds from "Background Elements Redux"
  • Music by Eric Matyas [soundimage.org]
    • Menu theme "Coin-Op Chaos 2"
    • Game theme "More Coin-Op Chaos"
    • Game Over theme "8-bit Puzzler"
  • SFX by SubspaceAudio
  • Font "District" by DamienG
Suggestion

The downloads aren't code-signed, so for the best experience, download via the itch.io app.
